ClassDescription.para:
The Avatar Environment represents the System and Avatar System Code.
While both contain the word System, they are not the same! It is important to understand the difference between the two.

AvtrSys.para:
The Avatar System represents the
Avatar environment that the Tingen Web Service interfaces with.
Common Avatar Systems include UAT and LIVE.
The Avatar System is different than the Avatar System Code.

MethodName.para:
The name of the Executing Assembly is a required component of all log files, as it is used to identify the class that is creating the log.
This is defined at the start of each class, so it can be used at any time that a log needs to be created.
